div.p: (1) M.O. contributed to the paper writing, concept design, plan, and design of the work, as well as conceptualization of the presented system; (2) J.G.T.-P., M.E.B.-J., and R.I.G.-B. made a substantial contributions to the literature research, concept design, paper writing, critical revision of the paper, and the plan and design of the work; (3) S.G.-M. and G.C. made a substantial contribution on system design and development; C.V. made substantial contributions to the concept design; (5) M.F.C.-U. and M.T.A.W. made substantial contributions to the concept design, to the critical revision of the paper, and supervision of the work.
